Bash(# Create a dedicated Screenshots folder in your organized structure
mkdir -p ~/Documents/Screenshots/{Work,Personal,Temp}

# Configure better screenshot settings
# Set save location to our organized Screenshots folder
defaults write com.apple.screencapture location ~/Documents/Screenshots/

# Remove drop shadow from window screenshots (cleaner look)
defaults write com.apple.screencapture disable-shadow -bool true

# Change default file format to PNG (best quality)
defaults write com.apple.screencapture type png

# Include date and time in filename for better organization
defaults write com.apple.screencapture include-date -bool true

# Show mouse pointer in screenshots (useful for tutorials)
defaults write com.apple.screencapture showsCursor -bool false

# Disable the sound effect
defaults write com.apple.screencapture sound -bool false)
